verification_notes: Adversarial searches conducted. Key findings: (1) Color trends confirmed with no criticism found; (2) Market forecasts vary by source - treat as estimates; (3) Ravelry decline CONFIRMED with accessibility controversy; (4) Tom Daley viral confirmed but TV show faced Fair Isle criticism; (5) Demographics surveys have acknowledged sampling bias toward Western/English-speaking populations; (6) KnitTok stats from platform data, not independently audited.
